More Informations Last refurbishment: 2012.
Breakfast: sweet and salty buffet. During meals choice between 2 menus, salad buffet, dessert or fruit.
Treatment of All Inclusive HB or FB includes drinks during meals such as (1/2 liter of water + 1/4 of wine or soft drink or beer per person per meal) + beach service with 1 sun umbrella per room and one sun bed per adult person.
Treatment of HBB or FBB includes drinks during meals such as (1/2 liter of water + 1/4 of wine or soft drink or beer per person per meal).
Credit cards accepted: Diners Club, Eurocard / Mastercard and Visa.
Every evening small aperitif in Hotel.
Check in from 12:00 (midday). Check out within 10:00 am.
